thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 19 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 1:02 PM, 27 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Rizal, Batangas, Metro Manila and Nueva Ecija within the next 2-3 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Pampanga(Mabalacat), Tarlac(Bamban), Quezon(Atimonan, Mauban, Tayabas, Lucena, Pagbilao), Zambales(Santa Cruz), Bataan(Morong, Bagac), Bulacan(Dona Remedios Trinidad), Laguna(Majayjay, Luisiana, Nagcarlan, Rizal, Liliw) and Cavite(Trece Martires, General Trias, Tanza) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
